name: Flush-Mountable Switch/Dimmer/Blind
desc: Z-Wave Wall Switch (Switch, Dimmer, Bind Control)
inc: Tripple Click one of the Rocker buttons
exc: Tripple Click one of the Rocker buttons
prep: A red/green blinking indicates that the device is in factory default and ready to be included

name: Key Fob
wake: Push all four buttons for 5 seconds until the green LEDs starts blinking slowly (Management Mode). Now hit button 2
inc: Short Click on Button 1 until red/green LED blinks
exc: Push all four buttons for 5 seconds until the green LEDs starts blinking slowly (Management Mode). Now hit button 2
prep: Short Click on Button 1 must start red/green blinking ot indicate that the device is in factory default an ready to be included

name: Universal Relay Switch
desc: Z-Wave in-wall Switch designed for being installed in junction boxes, flush mount boxes and near lights
inc: Normal Inclusion: press the B button on device once or three times, or alternatively press the external switch once
exc: Press the B button on device once or three times, or press external the number of times configured with parameter 65
prep: Press B and R buttons at the same time and then release R: if it stays ON for 2 seconds and OFF for 6 seconds it is not included and ready to be included

name: Universal Roller Shutter
desc: Z-Wave in-wall blind Control designed for being installed behind a standard switch
inc: Normal Inclusion: press the B button on device once or three times, or alternatively press the external switch once
exc: Press the B button on device once or three times or external switch after having enabled the learning mode with parameter 65

name: Energy Driven Switch
desc: Insert Module with advanced meter capabilities for active energy management
inc: Single click the button on the device
exc: Triple click the button on the device

name: Popp Smoke Detector
desc: Z-Wave Smoke Sensor with indoor siren function
inc: Pushing the internal button for 1 sec. includes and excludes the device.
exc: Pushing the internal button for 1 sec. includes and excludes the device.

name: Z-Weather
desc:
Z-Weather continually measures the wind speed and can, for example, trigger closing of the awning and blinds if it 
is too windy. It also measures the amount of rotation, enabling calculation of the 
wind yield per day or per year. In addition, Z-Weather includes sensors for humidity, 
temperature, air pressure and dew point, essentially providing the core sensors of 
a weather station.
wake:
Der Z-Weather erwacht von Zeit zu Zeit aus dem Stand-by-Modus sobald der Knopf 
gedrückt wird oder folgende außerplanmäßige Situationen eintreten: 
- Windstäke von mehr als 6 m/s (22 Km/h)
- Zum Ende der Morgendämmerung, wenn es hell wird 
- Zum Ende der Avenddämmerung, wenn es dunkel wird
inc:
Press  the  button  3  times  within  1.5  seconds.
Z-Weather  sends  a  NIF  (Network  Information  Frame)  and  waits  4  seconds  for  
inclusion  to  the  Z-Wave  network.  If  no  controller  includes  Z-Weather,  it  goes  to 
sleep after 4 seconds. Make sure to first instruct the inclusion controller to add a 
node and then press the Z-Weather button 3 times to add the device to the network.
exc:
Press  the  button  3  times  within  1.5  seconds.
Z-Weather  sends  a  NIF  (Network  Information  Frame)  and  waits  4  seconds  for  
inclusion  to  the  Z-Wave  network.  If  no  controller  includes  Z-Weather,  it  goes  to 
sleep after 4 seconds. Make sure to first instruct the inclusion controller to add a 
node and then press the Z-Weather button 3 times to add the device to the network.
